title: WhatsApp is rolling out Message Reactions to some beta users
content:
WhatsApp is one of the most popular instant messaging (IM) apps worldwide. Despite its slow development when compared to some of its rivals — such as Telegram — the company still succeeds in being the lead messenger in several regions. For example, the Meta-owned platform has been working on the multi-device feature for years. However,

The post WhatsApp is rolling out Message Reactions to some beta users appeared first on xda-developers.
description: WhatsApp is rolling out a new iMessage-like Message Reactions feature for some Android users on the beta channel of the app.
